summary: So uhhhh. Did anybody notice that the TV Tropes: Your Mileage May Vary page for Captain Marvel had to be shut down until the...
body:
So uhhhh. Did anybody notice that the TV Tropes: Your Mileage May Vary page for Captain Marvel had to be shut down until the film comes out, because it had become too much of a shitstorm of controversy and stupidity?

Keep in mind that this didn’t even happen with Ghostbusters (2016).

reblog.comment:

summary: Thoughts on the captain marvel trailer?
question: Thoughts on the captain marvel trailer?
answer: meh.. brie larsson looks wooden af i regret ever complaining abt gal gadot and i guess since the movie has the big reveal abt avengers being skrulls they’re not showing too much in the trailers also the vfx in those last shots looked like a video game i’m not looking foward to it at all also also idk why her voice is so high pitched all of the sudden like???

title: Avengers: Endgame = Thanos' Retirement
body:
Avengers: Endgame = Thanos’ Retirement

By now I’m sure most of us have seen the trailer for Avengers: Endgame that dropped on Friday. In it, we see Thanos taking up a new career. Farming. I suppose once you’ve fulfilled your life’s purpose, you just find another. Like in the Sims.

From sims.fandom.com

The real question, though, is what’s Thanos farming? And why does he need to use his armor as a scarecrow? Is he trying to keep the…

View On WordPress

summary:
I want Captain Marvel to use all the 90's slang in A4
Tony: Okay, that's the plan, everyone good?
Nat: Good.
Steve: Good.
Carol:...
body:
I want Captain Marvel to use all the 90’s slang in A4

Tony: Okay, that’s the plan, everyone good?

Nat: Good.

Steve: Good.

Carol: Tubular.

Or

Rhodey: How’ve you been Carol?

Carol: Man, I’m slammin.

Rhodey: ???

Or

Thanos: I did what was necessary.

Carol: Eat my shorts!

Steve: Good.

blog.name: tonyblessedstark
blog.title: ❝ I am Iron Man ❞
blog.description: Skye Erin Zoë | 19 | England | yes, I'm kinda gay |

summary: "I can't wait for Queen Carol Danvers to show up in Avengers: Endgame to save Tony and Nebula from space, then fly to Earth and...
body:
“I can’t wait for Queen Carol Danvers to show up in Avengers: Endgame to save Tony and Nebula from space, then fly to Earth and rain down all of her (Nicholas J) Fury on Thanos so that Tony "I carried the whole MCU for 10 years” Stark can wield the Infinity Gauntlet and bring back his spider son and wizard husband, along with all our other ashy fallen heroes.“

– Me, getting hyped and hopeful about next year’s Marvel films, refusing to acknowledge that it’s probably gonna end in tears.
